contentList.content: Creature suffers an additional [1] from the spellcaster. It also has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on Wisdom <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
